SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726428' and statustimeend>'1542726428' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726428' and statustimeend>'1542726428' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select follow from `ims_mc_mapping_fans` where openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726590' and statustimeend>'1542726590' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726590' and statustimeend>'1542726590' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select id,timelimit,coupontype,timedays,timestart,timeend,thumb,couponname,enough,backtype,deduct,discount,backmoney,backcredit,backredpack,bgcolor,thumb,credit,money,getmax,merchid,total as t,islimitlevel,limitmemberlevels,limitagentlevels,limitpartnerlevels,limitaagentlevels,limitgoodcatetype,limitgoodcateids,limitgoodtype,limitgoodids,tagtitle,settitlecolor,titlecolor from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c  where uniacid=:uniacid and money=0 and credit = 0 and coupontype=0 and merchid=0 and ( limitagentlevels = "" or  limitagentlevels is null ) and ( limitpartnerlevels = ""  or  limitpartnerlevels is null ) and ( limitaagentlevels = "" or  limitaagentlevels is null ) and gettype=1 and (total=-1 or total>0) and ( timelimit = 0 or  (timelimit=1 and timeend>1542726610)) order by displayorder desc, id desc  ;
select id,cates,marketprice,merchid   from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid=:uniacid and id =:id order by id desc LIMIT 1 ;
select pg.id,pg.pid,pg.goodsid,p.displayorder,p.title from `ims_ewei_shop_package_goods` as pg
                        left join `ims_ewei_shop_package` as p on pg.pid = p.id
                        where pg.uniacid = 107 and pg.goodsid = 13050 and  p.starttime <= 1542726610 and p.endtime >= 1542726610 and p.deleted = 0 and p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.displayorder desc,pg.id desc limit 1 ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726622' and statustimeend>'1542726622' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select id,timelimit,coupontype,timedays,timestart,timeend,thumb,couponname,enough,backtype,deduct,discount,backmoney,backcredit,backredpack,bgcolor,thumb,credit,money,getmax,merchid,total as t,islimitlevel,limitmemberlevels,limitagentlevels,limitpartnerlevels,limitaagentlevels,limitgoodcatetype,limitgoodcateids,limitgoodtype,limitgoodids,tagtitle,settitlecolor,titlecolor from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c  where uniacid=:uniacid and money=0 and credit = 0 and coupontype=0 and merchid=0 and ( limitagentlevels = "" or  limitagentlevels is null ) and ( limitpartnerlevels = ""  or  limitpartnerlevels is null ) and ( limitaagentlevels = "" or  limitaagentlevels is null ) and gettype=1 and (total=-1 or total>0) and ( timelimit = 0 or  (timelimit=1 and timeend>1542726634)) order by displayorder desc, id desc  ;

                        where pg.uniacid = 107 and pg.goodsid = 13050 and  p.starttime <= 1542726634 and p.endtime >= 1542726634 and p.deleted = 0 and p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.displayorder desc,pg.id desc limit 1 ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726971' and statustimeend>'1542726971' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542726971' and statustimeend>'1542726971' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT * FROM `ims_ewei_shop_category` WHERE uniacid =:uniacid AND enabled=1 ORDER BY parentid ASC, displayorder DESC;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select id,timelimit,coupontype,timedays,timestart,timeend,thumb,couponname,enough,backtype,deduct,discount,backmoney,backcredit,backredpack,bgcolor,thumb,credit,money,getmax,merchid,total as t,islimitlevel,limitmemberlevels,limitagentlevels,limitpartnerlevels,limitaagentlevels,limitgoodcatetype,limitgoodcateids,limitgoodtype,limitgoodids,tagtitle,settitlecolor,titlecolor from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c  where uniacid=:uniacid and money=0 and credit = 0 and coupontype=0 and merchid=0 and ( limitagentlevels = "" or  limitagentlevels is null ) and ( limitpartnerlevels = ""  or  limitpartnerlevels is null ) and ( limitaagentlevels = "" or  limitaagentlevels is null ) and gettype=1 and (total=-1 or total>0) and ( timelimit = 0 or  (timelimit=1 and timeend>1542726989)) order by displayorder desc, id desc  ;

select id,timelimit,coupontype,timedays,timestart,timeend,thumb,couponname,enough,backtype,deduct,discount,backmoney,backcredit,backredpack,bgcolor,thumb,credit,money,getmax,merchid,total as t,islimitlevel,limitmemberlevels,limitagentlevels,limitpartnerlevels,limitaagentlevels,limitgoodcatetype,limitgoodcateids,limitgoodtype,limitgoodids,tagtitle,settitlecolor,titlecolor from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c  where uniacid=:uniacid and money=0 and credit = 0 and coupontype=0 and merchid=0 and ( limitagentlevels = "" or  limitagentlevels is null ) and ( limitpartnerlevels = ""  or  limitpartnerlevels is null ) and ( limitaagentlevels = "" or  limitaagentlevels is null ) and gettype=1 and (total=-1 or total>0) and ( timelimit = 0 or  (timelimit=1 and timeend>1542726996)) order by displayorder desc, id desc  ;
select id,cates,marketprice,merchid   from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid=:uniacid and id =:id order by id desc LIMIT 1 ;
select pg.id,pg.pid,pg.goodsid,p.displayorder,p.title from `ims_ewei_shop_package_goods` as pg
                        left join `ims_ewei_shop_package` as p on pg.pid = p.id
                        where pg.uniacid = 107 and pg.goodsid = 13074 and  p.starttime <= 1542726996 and p.endtime >= 1542726996 and p.deleted = 0 and p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.displayorder desc,pg.id desc limit 1 ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727000' and statustimeend>'1542727000' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

select id,ordersn,machineid, price,openid,dispatchtype,addressid,carrier,status,isverify,deductcredit2,`virtual`,isvirtual,couponid,isvirtualsend,isparent,paytype,merchid,agentid,createtime,buyagainprice,istrade,tradestatus,isprepay,isprepaysuccess,balance from `ims_ewei_shop_order` where  ordersn=:ordersn and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT p.*,o.openid FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_peerpay` AS p JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` AS o ON p.orderid = o.id WHERE p.orderid = :orderid AND p.uniacid = :uniacid AND (p.status = 0 OR p.status=1) AND o.status >= 0 LIMIT 1;
select id,ordersn, price,openid,status, paytype, deductcredit2, couponid,isparent,merchid,agentid,createtime from `ims_ewei_shop_order` where  id=:id and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select uniacid,total,goodsid,optionid,seckill_timeid,seckill_taskid from  `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` where orderid=125445 and  seckill=1 ;
select  *   from  `ims_ewei_shop_verifygoods` where  orderid=:orderid ;
select o.openid,o.uniacid,o.id as orderid,og.storeid, og.id as ordergoodsid,g.verifygoodsdays,g.verifygoodsnum,g.verifygoodslimittype,g.verifygoodslimitdate,og.total  from `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods`   og inner join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on og.goodsid = g.id
          inner join `ims_ewei_shop_order` o on og.orderid = o.id
          where   og.orderid =:orderid and g.type = 5;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727007' and statustimeend>'1542727007' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727007' and statustimeend>'1542727007' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select  COUNT(1)  from `ims_ewei_shop_verifygoods`   vg
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` og on vg.ordergoodsid = og.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order` o on vg.orderid = o.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order_refund` orf on o.refundid = orf.id
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on og.goodsid = g.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_cards` c on c.id = g.cardid
                 where   vg.uniacid=:uniacid and vg.openid=:openid and vg.invalid =0   order by vg.starttime desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select store_id,shop_id  from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where uniacid=:uniacid and openid=:openid ;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_merch_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select follow from `ims_mc_mapping_fans` where openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
 SELECT `uid` FROM `ims_mc_mapping_fans` WHERE `uniacid` = :__uniacid_7 AND `openid` = :__openid_8  LIMIT 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT * FROM `ims_ewei_shop_category` WHERE uniacid =:uniacid AND enabled=1 ORDER BY parentid ASC, displayorder DESC;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727055' and statustimeend>'1542727055' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727055' and statustimeend>'1542727055' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id in(0);

SELECT c.goodsid,g.cash,g.fixed_pay,g.fixed_money,c.total,g.maxbuy,g.type,g.issendfree,g.isnodiscount,g.ispresell,g.presellprice as gpprice,o.presellprice,g.preselltimeend,g.presellsendstatrttime,g.presellsendtime,g.presellsendtype,g.isprepay,g.prepayprice,g.weight,o.weight as optionweight,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice,o.title as optiontitle,c.optionid,g.isfullback, g.storeids,g.isverify,g.deduct,g.manydeduct,g.virtual,o.virtual as optionvirtual,discounts, g.deduct2,g.ednum,g.edmoney,g.edareas,g.diyformtype,g.diyformid,diymode,g.dispatchtype,g.dispatchid,g.dispatchprice,g.minbuy  ,g.isdiscount,g.isdiscount_time,g.isdiscount_discounts,g.cates,  g.virtualsend,invoice,o.specs,g.merchid,g.checked,g.merchsale, g.buyagain,g.buyagain_islong,g.buyagain_condition, g.buyagain_sale FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` c  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on c.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on c.optionid = o.id  where c.openid=:openid and c.selected=1 and  c.deleted=0 and c.uniacid=:uniacid  order by c.id desc;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_store` where  uniacid=:uniacid and status=1 and type in(1,3)  and id= '32'  order by displayorder desc,id desc;

select * from `ims_ewei_shop_area_config` where uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;

select d.frommerch,d.fromtype,d.amount, d.id,d.couponid,d.goodscates,c.enough,c.merchid,c.limitgoodtype,c.limitgoodcatetype,c.limitgoodcateids,c.limitgoodids  from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon_data` d left join `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c on d.couponid = c.id where d.openid=:openid and d.uniacid=:uniacid and c.merchid=0 and d.merchid=0 and c.coupontype=0 and d.used=0  and (   (c.timelimit = 0 and ( c.timedays=0 or c.timedays*86400 + d.gettime >=unix_timestamp() ) )  or  (c.timelimit =1 and c.timestart<=1542727075 && c.timeend>=1542727075)) order by d.gettime desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727087' and statustimeend>'1542727087' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727087' and statustimeend>'1542727087' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727089' and statustimeend>'1542727089' and type !=10  ;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_95 WHERE `id` = :__id_96;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727089' and statustimeend>'1542727089' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_97 WHERE `id` = :__id_98;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727089' and statustimeend>'1542727089' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727100' and statustimeend>'1542727100' and type !=10  ;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727100' and statustimeend>'1542727100' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727100' and statustimeend>'1542727100' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select follow from `ims_mc_mapping_fans` where openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;

SET NAMES 'utf8';;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_1  LIMIT 1;
 SELECT * FROM `ims_account` WHERE `acid` = :__acid_2  LIMIT 1;
 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_3  LIMIT 1;
 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_4  LIMIT 1;

SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727102' and statustimeend>'1542727102' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727102' and statustimeend>'1542727102' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_273 WHERE `id` = :__id_274;
select  COUNT(1)  from `ims_ewei_shop_verifygoods`   vg
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` og on vg.ordergoodsid = og.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order` o on vg.orderid = o.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order_refund` orf on o.refundid = orf.id
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on og.goodsid = g.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_cards` c on c.id = g.cardid
                 where   vg.uniacid=:uniacid and vg.openid=:openid and vg.invalid =0   order by vg.starttime desc;

UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_355 WHERE `id` = :__id_356;
select  COUNT(1)  from `ims_ewei_shop_verifygoods`   vg
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` og on vg.ordergoodsid = og.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order` o on vg.orderid = o.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order_refund` orf on o.refundid = orf.id
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on og.goodsid = g.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_cards` c on c.id = g.cardid
                 where   vg.uniacid=:uniacid and vg.openid=:openid and vg.invalid =0   order by vg.starttime desc;

select  COUNT(1)  from `ims_ewei_shop_verifygoods`   vg
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` og on vg.ordergoodsid = og.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order` o on vg.orderid = o.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_order_refund` orf on o.refundid = orf.id
                 inner join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on og.goodsid = g.id
                 left  join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_cards` c on c.id = g.cardid
                 where   vg.uniacid=:uniacid and vg.openid=:openid and vg.invalid =0   order by vg.starttime desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT c.goodsid,g.cash,g.fixed_pay,g.fixed_money,c.total,g.maxbuy,g.type,g.issendfree,g.isnodiscount,g.ispresell,g.presellprice as gpprice,o.presellprice,g.preselltimeend,g.presellsendstatrttime,g.presellsendtime,g.presellsendtype,g.isprepay,g.prepayprice,g.weight,o.weight as optionweight,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice,o.title as optiontitle,c.optionid,g.isfullback, g.storeids,g.isverify,g.deduct,g.manydeduct,g.virtual,o.virtual as optionvirtual,discounts, g.deduct2,g.ednum,g.edmoney,g.edareas,g.diyformtype,g.diyformid,diymode,g.dispatchtype,g.dispatchid,g.dispatchprice,g.minbuy  ,g.isdiscount,g.isdiscount_time,g.isdiscount_discounts,g.cates,  g.virtualsend,invoice,o.specs,g.merchid,g.checked,g.merchsale, g.buyagain,g.buyagain_islong,g.buyagain_condition, g.buyagain_sale FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` c  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on c.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on c.optionid = o.id  where c.openid=:openid and c.selected=1 and  c.deleted=0 and c.uniacid=:uniacid  order by c.id desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_131 WHERE `id` = :__id_132;

SELECT c.goodsid,g.cash,g.fixed_pay,g.fixed_money,c.total,g.maxbuy,g.type,g.issendfree,g.isnodiscount,g.ispresell,g.presellprice as gpprice,o.presellprice,g.preselltimeend,g.presellsendstatrttime,g.presellsendtime,g.presellsendtype,g.isprepay,g.prepayprice,g.weight,o.weight as optionweight,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice,o.title as optiontitle,c.optionid,g.isfullback, g.storeids,g.isverify,g.deduct,g.manydeduct,g.virtual,o.virtual as optionvirtual,discounts, g.deduct2,g.ednum,g.edmoney,g.edareas,g.diyformtype,g.diyformid,diymode,g.dispatchtype,g.dispatchid,g.dispatchprice,g.minbuy  ,g.isdiscount,g.isdiscount_time,g.isdiscount_discounts,g.cates,  g.virtualsend,invoice,o.specs,g.merchid,g.checked,g.merchsale, g.buyagain,g.buyagain_islong,g.buyagain_condition, g.buyagain_sale FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` c  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on c.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on c.optionid = o.id  where c.openid=:openid and c.selected=1 and  c.deleted=0 and c.uniacid=:uniacid  order by c.id desc;

select d.frommerch,d.fromtype,d.amount, d.id,d.couponid,d.goodscates,c.enough,c.merchid,c.limitgoodtype,c.limitgoodcatetype,c.limitgoodcateids,c.limitgoodids  from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon_data` d left join `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c on d.couponid = c.id where d.openid=:openid and d.uniacid=:uniacid and c.merchid=0 and d.merchid=0 and c.coupontype=0 and d.used=0  and (   (c.timelimit = 0 and ( c.timedays=0 or c.timedays*86400 + d.gettime >=unix_timestamp() ) )  or  (c.timelimit =1 and c.timestart<=1542727171 && c.timeend>=1542727171)) order by d.gettime desc;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727184' and statustimeend>'1542727184' and type !=10  AND ( FIND_IN_SET(1438,cates) <>0 ) ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727184' and statustimeend>'1542727184' and type !=10  AND ( FIND_IN_SET(1438,cates) <>0 )order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_4  LIMIT 1;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid_wa=:openid   and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid_wa=:openid   and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid_wa=:openid   and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727189' and statustimeend>'1542727189' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727203' and statustimeend>'1542727203' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727203' and statustimeend>'1542727203' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727205' and statustimeend>'1542727205' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727205' and statustimeend>'1542727205' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

select og.id,g.title, og.goodsid,og.optionid,g.total as stock,og.total as buycount,g.status,g.deleted,g.maxbuy,g.usermaxbuy,g.istime,g.timestart,g.timeend,g.buylevels,g.buygroups,g.totalcnf,og.seckill from  `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` og  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on og.goodsid = g.id  where og.orderid=:orderid and og.uniacid=:uniacid ;

 SELECT `uid` FROM `ims_mc_mapping_fans` WHERE `uniacid` = :__uniacid_5 AND `openid` = :__openid_6  LIMIT 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select store_id,shop_id  from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where uniacid=:uniacid and openid=:openid ;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_merch_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select follow from `ims_mc_mapping_fans` where openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
 SELECT `uid` FROM `ims_mc_mapping_fans` WHERE `uniacid` = :__uniacid_5 AND `openid` = :__openid_6  LIMIT 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where  openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select follow from `ims_mc_mapping_fans` where openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
 SELECT `uid` FROM `ims_mc_mapping_fans` WHERE `uniacid` = :__uniacid_7 AND `openid` = :__openid_8  LIMIT 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_7 WHERE `id` = :__id_8;
SELECT * FROM `ims_ewei_shop_category` WHERE uniacid =:uniacid AND enabled=1 ORDER BY parentid ASC, displayorder DESC;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727208' and statustimeend>'1542727208' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727208' and statustimeend>'1542727208' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727210' and statustimeend>'1542727210' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727210' and statustimeend>'1542727210' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select d.frommerch,d.fromtype,d.amount, d.id,d.couponid,d.goodscates,c.enough,c.merchid,c.limitgoodtype,c.limitgoodcatetype,c.limitgoodcateids,c.limitgoodids  from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon_data` d left join `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c on d.couponid = c.id where d.openid=:openid and d.uniacid=:uniacid and c.merchid=0 and d.merchid=0 and c.coupontype=0 and d.used=0  and (   (c.timelimit = 0 and ( c.timedays=0 or c.timedays*86400 + d.gettime >=unix_timestamp() ) )  or  (c.timelimit =1 and c.timestart<=1542727219 && c.timeend>=1542727219)) order by d.gettime desc;

 SELECT `uid` FROM `ims_mc_mapping_fans` WHERE `uniacid` = :__uniacid_7 AND `openid` = :__openid_8  LIMIT 1;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_21 WHERE `id` = :__id_22;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_23 WHERE `id` = :__id_24;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727222' and statustimeend>'1542727222' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727222' and statustimeend>'1542727222' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
SELECT * FROM `ims_ewei_shop_category` WHERE uniacid =:uniacid AND enabled=1 ORDER BY parentid ASC, displayorder DESC;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_7 WHERE `id` = :__id_8;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727230' and statustimeend>'1542727230' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

select d.frommerch,d.fromtype,d.amount, d.id,d.couponid,d.goodscates,c.enough,c.merchid,c.limitgoodtype,c.limitgoodcatetype,c.limitgoodcateids,c.limitgoodids  from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon_data` d left join `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c on d.couponid = c.id where d.openid=:openid and d.uniacid=:uniacid and c.merchid=0 and d.merchid=0 and c.coupontype=0 and d.used=0  and (   (c.timelimit = 0 and ( c.timedays=0 or c.timedays*86400 + d.gettime >=unix_timestamp() ) )  or  (c.timelimit =1 and c.timestart<=1542727235 && c.timeend>=1542727235)) order by d.gettime desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727238' and statustimeend>'1542727238' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727238' and statustimeend>'1542727238' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_51 WHERE `id` = :__id_52;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727240' and statustimeend>'1542727240' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727240' and statustimeend>'1542727240' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select store_id,shop_id  from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where uniacid=:uniacid and openid=:openid ;

select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
SELECT * FROM `ims_ewei_shop_category` WHERE uniacid =:uniacid AND enabled=1 ORDER BY parentid ASC, displayorder DESC;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727252' and statustimeend>'1542727252' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727259' and statustimeend>'1542727259' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727260' and statustimeend>'1542727260' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727260' and statustimeend>'1542727260' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;

select id,timelimit,coupontype,timedays,timestart,timeend,thumb,couponname,enough,backtype,deduct,discount,backmoney,backcredit,backredpack,bgcolor,thumb,credit,money,getmax,merchid,total as t,islimitlevel,limitmemberlevels,limitagentlevels,limitpartnerlevels,limitaagentlevels,limitgoodcatetype,limitgoodcateids,limitgoodtype,limitgoodids,tagtitle,settitlecolor,titlecolor from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c  where uniacid=:uniacid and money=0 and credit = 0 and coupontype=0 and merchid=0 and ( limitagentlevels = "" or  limitagentlevels is null ) and ( limitpartnerlevels = ""  or  limitpartnerlevels is null ) and ( limitaagentlevels = "" or  limitaagentlevels is null ) and gettype=1 and (total=-1 or total>0) and ( timelimit = 0 or  (timelimit=1 and timeend>1542727271)) order by displayorder desc, id desc  ;

select pg.id,pg.pid,pg.goodsid,p.displayorder,p.title from `ims_ewei_shop_package_goods` as pg
                        left join `ims_ewei_shop_package` as p on pg.pid = p.id
                        where pg.uniacid = 107 and pg.goodsid = 7309 and  p.starttime <= 1542727271 and p.endtime >= 1542727271 and p.deleted = 0 and p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.displayorder desc,pg.id desc limit 1 ;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727274' and statustimeend>'1542727274' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727279' and statustimeend>'1542727279' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727279' and statustimeend>'1542727279' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727294' and statustimeend>'1542727294' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727294' and statustimeend>'1542727294' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_621 WHERE `id` = :__id_622;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_623 WHERE `id` = :__id_624;
select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727296' and statustimeend>'1542727296' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727296' and statustimeend>'1542727296' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
select sets from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_user` where uniacid=:uniacid and id=:id limit 1 ;

UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_623 WHERE `id` = :__id_624;
select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727299' and statustimeend>'1542727299' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727299' and statustimeend>'1542727299' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

select * from `ims_ewei_shop_merch_saler` where wxappopenid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_member` SET `store_id` = :store_id_9 WHERE `uniacid` = :__uniacid_10 AND `openid` = :__openid_11;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727311' and statustimeend>'1542727311' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727311' and statustimeend>'1542727311' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;
UPDATE `ims_ewei_shop_goods` SET `status` = :status_155 WHERE `id` = :__id_156;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727319' and statustimeend>'1542727319' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727319' and statustimeend>'1542727319' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727322' and statustimeend>'1542727322' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;

SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select store_id,shop_id  from `ims_ewei_shop_member` where uniacid=:uniacid and openid=:openid ;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_merch_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
SELECT storename FROM `ims_ewei_shop_store`where uniacid=:uniacid AND id=:id;
 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_4  LIMIT 1;
 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_5  LIMIT 1;
select id,statustimestart,statustimeend,status,isstatustime from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid = 107 and isstatustime > 0 and deleted = 0 and status < 2;
 SELECT `value` FROM `ims_core_cache` WHERE `key` = :__key_5  LIMIT 1;
SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727344' and statustimeend>'1542727344' and type !=10  ;
SELECT id as gid,title,subtitle,thumb,marketprice,productprice,minprice,maxprice,isdiscount,isdiscount_time,isstatustime,statustimestart,status,statustimeend,isdiscount_discounts,sales,salesreal,total,description,bargain,`type`,hasoption FROM `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where 1 and `uniacid` = :uniacid AND `deleted` = 0 and status<2 and `checked` = 0 and isstatustime=1  and statustimestart<'1542727344' and statustimeend>'1542727344' and type !=10 order by displayorder desc;
SELECT m.nickname,m.avatar FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE og.goodsid=:gid AND m.uniacid=:uniacid order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.id,f.total,f.goodsid,g.total as stock, o.stock as optionstock, g.maxbuy,g.title,g.thumb,ifnull(o.marketprice, g.marketprice) as marketprice, g.productprice,o.title as optiontitle,f.optionid,o.specs,g.minbuy,g.maxbuy,g.unit,f.merchid,g.merchsale ,f.selected FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` f  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods` g on f.goodsid = g.id  left join `ims_ewei_shop_goods_option` o on f.optionid = o.id  where 1  and f.uniacid= :uniacid and f.openid=:openid and f.deleted=0 ORDER BY `id` DESC ;

select count(*) from `ims_ewei_shop_member_favorite` where goodsid=:goodsid and deleted=0 and openid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
SELECT credit1,credit2 FROM `ims_ewei_shop_member` WHERE openid_wa=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;
select sum(total) from `ims_ewei_shop_member_cart` where uniacid=:uniacid and openid=:openid  and deleted=0 limit 1;
select * from `ims_ewei_shop_saler` where wxappopenid=:openid and uniacid=:uniacid limit 1;

select count(1) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid=:uniacid  and isnew=1 and status=1 and deleted=0;
select count(1) from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid=:uniacid  and isdiscount=1 and status=1 and deleted=0;
select id,timelimit,coupontype,timedays,timestart,timeend,thumb,couponname,enough,backtype,deduct,discount,backmoney,backcredit,backredpack,bgcolor,thumb,credit,money,getmax,merchid,total as t,islimitlevel,limitmemberlevels,limitagentlevels,limitpartnerlevels,limitaagentlevels,limitgoodcatetype,limitgoodcateids,limitgoodtype,limitgoodids,tagtitle,settitlecolor,titlecolor from `ims_ewei_shop_coupon` c  where uniacid=:uniacid and money=0 and credit = 0 and coupontype=0 and merchid=0 and ( limitagentlevels = "" or  limitagentlevels is null ) and ( limitpartnerlevels = ""  or  limitpartnerlevels is null ) and ( limitaagentlevels = "" or  limitaagentlevels is null ) and gettype=1 and (total=-1 or total>0) and ( timelimit = 0 or  (timelimit=1 and timeend>1542727352)) order by displayorder desc, id desc  ;
select id,cates,marketprice,merchid   from `ims_ewei_shop_goods` where uniacid=:uniacid and id =:id order by id desc LIMIT 1 ;
select pg.id,pg.pid,pg.goodsid,p.displayorder,p.title from `ims_ewei_shop_package_goods` as pg
                        left join `ims_ewei_shop_package` as p on pg.pid = p.id
                        where pg.uniacid = 107 and pg.goodsid = 13076 and  p.starttime <= 1542727352 and p.endtime >= 1542727352 and p.deleted = 0 and p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.displayorder desc,pg.id desc limit 1 ;

SELECT o.openid,o.createtime,m.nickname,m.avatar,og.total FROM `ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_order` as o ON  og.orderid=o.id LEFT JOIN `ims_ewei_shop_member`as m ON m.openid=o.openid WHERE o.uniacid='107' AND og.goodsid='13076' order by o.createtime DESC LIMIT 0,10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM`ims_ewei_shop_order` as o LEFT JOIN`ims_ewei_shop_order_goods` as og ON o.id=og.orderid WHERE o.uniacid=:uniacid AND og.goodsid=:goodsid;
